titleInfo.title: Johnny Paycheck Publicity Photo with Rubylith

mods.accessCondition: This digital image is the property of the Country Music Hall of FameÂ® and Museum and is protected by U.S. and international copyright laws. The image may not be downloaded, reproduced, or distributed without permission. To inquire about use permissions and obtain a high-quality version of this file, contact print@countrymusichalloffame.org. Please cite image information in email.
mods.abstract: Black and white three-quarter length portrait of Johnny Paycheck standing in front of a view of Manhattan. The photo was released by Epic Records and Buddy Lee Attractions Inc. A Rubylith masking film is taped to the photo. Handwritten notes on the back of the photo say, "Same size" and "61%," presumably in reference to the metal photoplate made from the photo. To view a poster that features the metal photoplate, see https://digi.countrymusichalloffame.org/digital/collection/hatch3/id/22120.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
